steps.nodeStepDescription: This weapon causes kinetic damage.

Agile sight. 
Lightning-fast handling.

Snapshot sight. 
Excellent handling.
Superb target acquisition.

Standard sight.
A lightweight design, good for recoil control.

Increased Range and Stability 
Slower Reload, Reduced Magazine Size

Increased Stability, Faster Handling 
Reduced Range

Increased Range 
Slower Reload

Increased Range 
Reduced Stability

Increased Stability 
Reduced Range
This weapon gains better target acquisition.
Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.
This weapon has increased stability.
Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.
Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.
This weapon grows more accurate the longer it is fired.
Radar stays active while aiming down this weapon's sights.
The bottom half of each magazine causes additional damage.
Improved accuracy while airborne.
This weapon's magazine will be refilled whenever you unleash your Super.
Melee kills while this weapon is equipped have a chance to refill the magazine.
Kills with this weapon grant a brief boost to the sprint's top speed.
Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus accuracy.
This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.
Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.
When zoomed, this weapon fires slower, but causes additional damage.

Agile sight. 
For smooth engagement in close quarters.

Accurized sight. 
For precise fire.

Snapshot sight. 
Enhanced target acquisition.

Precision sight. 
Highest zoom in class. 
Enhanced range.

Flexible sight. 
Enhances handling, range, and recoil control.

Agile scope. 
Modest zoom. 
Light and snappy.

Mid-range scope. 
Good effective range and recoil control. 
Heavy and slow.
When held, this weapon grants +2 character Agility.
Aiming this weapon is incredibly fast.

These iridium-core rounds overpenetrate targets.
Their mass slows down weapon handling.
This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
A larger magazine.

Oversize rounds built to stagger targets and leave them reeling.
Their mass makes a weapon harder to handle.
Reload this weapon quickly.
Switch weapons faster. Move quicker while aiming.
Reload this weapon even faster.

Ceramic-jacketed rounds ricochet on hard surfaces.
Their extreme density lets you carry more rounds in reserve.
Added mass slows down weapon handling.

The Gunsmith can reforge this weapon, changing its available upgrades but resetting any progression or ascension.

To reforge, equip this weapon and speak to the Gunsmith.
Increases the Attack value of this weapon to the highest available in Year 1.
